website_summaries.verdict: Super fast, portable printer for color-rich photos with a cool, vintage feel.
pros: Prints come out fast in 10 seconds
Color is saturated and with borders that give prints a nostalgic Polaroid look, without the blurriness
Clear retention of iPhone image quality
Rechargeable battery and also can charge via standard USB port
No ink or mess, just a cartridge change
Free app allows you to select and edit your iPhone photos before printing
cons: A little complicated to connect printer’s WiFi to iPhone – too many steps
Blacks come out pretty dark, which can be fixed in color balance on the app

website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm Instax Share SP-2 is a fun accessory to have for those who really love mobile photography, letting you print snapshots anytime, anywhere.
pros: The Fujifilm Instax Share SP-2 is faster and more compact and stylish than the original
The updated mobile app adds new filters and templates
It uses film and not ink and paper and has a rechargeable, removable battery
cons: The printer's price is maybe a touch too high for an impulse purchase and the cost per print might also be a turn off

customer_reviews.title: Apple users beware- will not work with current iOS
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little product but no support from the company. No longer works with Apple products. The app which is required to use this product with iOS has not been updated in 9months and if you have the current iOS installed on your iPhone or iPad this app and therefore this printer will not work at all! Such a bummer because I used to love this printer so much.
customer_reviews.author: deirdre doyle

customer_reviews.title: Anyone want to buy my SP-1?
customer_reviews.text: If you're considering the SP-2 as an upgrade from the SP-1, I definitely recommend it. A few noticeable changes from the SP-1: - the new design feature soft grip feelings on the side while maintaining a sleek look and better stand - quieter, faster printing - rechargeable battery - clearer film count and battery life - more contrasted prints The only downside I could think of for not getting this printer is if you enjoy the old-timey faded look of original polaroids. Since the SP-2 is a higher resolution printer, the images come out sharper and more contrasted -- which is not a characteristic of traditional polaroid photos.
customer_reviews.author: IG: @mistermajestic

customer_reviews.title: We like this better than our InstaxMini Camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge hit with the teenagers in my household. We bought an Instax Mini camera last year, but we can rarely capture good photos on it. They are nearly all washed out or out of focus. It is also difficult to bring the big bulky camera along on trips. My kids love that they can snap photos on their phones and come back to print "Polaroid" photos. We have had no issues connecting to the printer. We've downloaded the app to our smartphones, and it has worked perfectly every time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sussya

customer_reviews.title: really nice
customer_reviews.text: looks better than on pictures. Really love the idea that you actually can charge it using usb port. The quality of pictures is good enough for someone who cares about having memories. I bought it to print old pictures and in case if I forget to grab my camera, I could use it to print pictures taken on my phone. I had no problems with the app. Everything worked. Haven't updated my ios tho. So maybe if you want it to work, you should not update your phone
customer_reviews.author: Razmik

customer_reviews.title: I love this little printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little printer! It is much more convenient that carrying around an actual instant camera! I get very nice pictures without the worry of wasting the expensive instant film. I love having the ability to print photos on the go for other people and I love having an actual photo album of these pictures because now-a-days everyone just keeps digital copies on SD cards and flash drives that will never see the light of day again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Youngstein

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daugther's 17th birthday, along with film packs and carrying case. Sadly-it will not charge. We have trouble shot every way we can think. It looks like others have had similar issues. Quite disappointing..... now I'll have to return all the accessories along with this printer. REALLY wish it had worked out of the box.... it looks so fun.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: I love this printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer. I have tossed away so many pictures taken on my instax camera due to poor lighting or poor composition. This printer has taken the guess work out of instant photography. It is compact and easy to travel with. It has a rechargeable batter and it is very easy to set up. It took me about 10 minutes to figure out how to use this with the app. I have an iphone 6s and it works perfectly with the app and the printer. Make sure that when you print you select the WIFI printer option. It is not bluetooth enabled.******** update August 2018 it also has been working perfectly with my iPhone X
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter at Xmas . She was very excited. But when she tried to use it 6 weeks later it wouldn’t work right. It keeps spewing film. Costly and wasteful . Then app says printer had no film. I personally loaded a new pack to make sure it was loaded correctly . Same thing happens: film just comes out when you turn on the printer. But app says printer had no film and won’t print. We have wasted multiple packs of film . I do not recommend this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Ricarda Benz

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all. The app on my phone could never find the printer. I was not able to use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: acck

customer_reviews.title: Great for perfectionists who want Polaroids!
customer_reviews.text: I was very anxious to use this after reading some bad reviews about the app, but it works amazing! I have the iPhone XR and I tested it with a open film cartridge as a test, and it worked flawlessly. The prints turn out Polaroid quality, so don't expect it to look as nice as it does on your phone (i.e. Color and brightness)! Great way to get cute pictures from your phone into your hand! If you're a perfectionist, and hate wasting film or lugging the Instax Camera, get this! Best to adjust the contrast and saturation a bit to make the picture more visible, as it often makes pictures a but bright (idk how else to explain)
customer_reviews.author: Oriel

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually pretty optimistic when reading reviews before buying. I find people are often pickier or unluckier than I am with most things I've bought online; however, I was hoping for more photo/print quality with this printer. The app definitely helps when you use automatic enhancer, to brighten the photo once it's printed, but even with the app, I find the photos to be dark and grainy; which is especially difficult with a picture so small. I bought this as a fun activity to do at a bachelorette party and bridal shower, so I thought this would be an ok option; but I honestly would have paid for a photo-booth rather than the DIY method I did with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ogilvie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this simply because of it's price versus the price of the Polaroid Mini. I got it for a party and it was awesome! It was easy to set up, charges quickly and prints quickly. The pictures do tend to come out better if they are taken closer up (i've included some examples) but that all comes with learning the polaroids! Still happy with the purchase! It's also great that you can make multiple copies of the same picture.
customer_reviews.author: shann

customer_reviews.title: ANDROID USERS!
customer_reviews.text: I have galaxy 8+ with android 8.0 version. Following only the instructions in the package did not allow my printer to work. Follow the instructions but make sure your location setting is on! You will have trouble finding the printer without it.
customer_reviews.author: amber guadalajara

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to use with her iphone. The first one we received wouldn't turn on after being charged so I exchanged it for another. This one arrived and again it wouldn't turn on, charged it, purchased a new batter for it and nothing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Old School Meets New, Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This was my PRIME DAY steal, by far! I have an Instax Camera, but I also have a busy toddler who hasn't learned what posing is (Haha). This helps reduce the amount of film I fly through with my Instax, and I love how it's mobile and allows me to hand family and friends a sweet keepsake right then and there! Their reactions are priceless! Great buy! Great gift idea for the crafting person, journaling person or photographer in your life. Love this adorable little invention.
customer_reviews.author: Bangs McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the hype!
customer_reviews.text: Having this saves so much space in my bag compared to the normal Fujifilm Cameras! Not only can you print the current photos you want, but you can print just about any photos from the past that you want. It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Alayne Santos

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this little machine! The bluetooth works seemlessly and overall it is very easy to use. The pictures look just like what would come out of an actual instax camera, except you get to choose the good ones you actually want printed from your phone instead of wasting a bunch of film. I spent the first few days printing out old pictures from over the years, which was awesome, and now I usually print out my favorites from my phone after any trip or get together. Everyone should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Junk, no customer service !
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my child in college so she could hang pictures up in her dorm . The print quality was poor , but she was not bothered by the quality. The printer stopped working around 6 months of use . However, it was used very little and I only bought film for it TWICE. Multiple attempts from my daughter have gone unanswered so she’s stuck with a non working printer . Save your money or buy another brand who stands behind their product and actually has customer service .
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Not a want but a NEED.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have so many Polaroid cameras but am tired of having to find the perfect angle, perfect lighting to capture the perfect shot. Even then it might not come out perfect because someone might blink or a bird might fly in the frame. So I love being able to pick out pictures that I know I love. And I don’t have to lug this around. I can just leave it at home and print polaroids whenever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Madayag

customer_reviews.title: Definite upgrade from the Instax camera itself!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product. I was tired of wasting Instax film using the camera. I could never get my shots lined up. The view finder on it was terrible, especially for close up shots. This solves all my problems PLUS I can mess with the brightness, saturation, and contrast to get my pictures perfect. I have to enable location to sync my phone and camera. Works across 4 different phone brands and models in my household. A huge hit with everyone that takes pictures here. Charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: If you want to print pictures from your own photo ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want to print pictures from your own photo library, this printer is NOT for you. I got this for Christmas, on the amazon website stated “It can print from your photo library”, it worked for 20 prints, After that it won’t print anything from photo albums or social media pictures on its app!! It popped up a message said “the selected photo cannot be used”, found many people online with the same problem!!
customer_reviews.author: christine zhong

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel super girly
customer_reviews.text: OMG so I just received my printer despite getting an email about delayed delivery which was quickly resolved. Obviously read the manual or else you risk doing something stupid. I charged it, loaded the mini film which came in the same delivery and voila I printed 6 gorgeous pictures. To connect to the printer, go to wifi and it will be named INSTAX and a number. The quality is amazing. I did one black and white which was not as nice but I'll probably try again because I know from the other 5 color photos that the quality is good. Now next on my list is to buy string lights to hang my pictures on!
customer_reviews.author: le bear

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues still not fixed.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is not great but I liked the polaroid option. After the first use I can not connect it again. I read reviews on app and so many others are having the same issue. This leads me to believe it is a known defect that Fuji is refusing to fix. Do not waste your money. No problem connecting my polaroid printer.
customer_reviews.author: KayInTheCity

customer_reviews.title: Printer works great but the app is a little outdated
customer_reviews.text: Printer works great but the app is a little outdated. You need to know exactly which pictures you want to print before turning the printer on, because it will shut off pretty quickly if there is no selection. Scroll through your camera roll and make an album of all the pics you want printed to make everything go smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle96

customer_reviews.title: Sad Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Printer came without battery (despite included in listing). Got another printer, still no battery. Called Fuji, agent said to email. Emailed Fuji, agent said to call. Manual not accompanied. Had to go online to figure out how to use device (e.x. which app to download).
customer_reviews.author: Janine R.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. turns your phone pictures into cute little Polaroids
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. turns your phone pictures into cute little Polaroids. I already have a bunch of film since im a huge instax fan. It is great to be able to check out my pictures before printing them. With the regular camera, you have to hope your picture will come out okay, and if not...there goes a dollar worth of film. It is nice to be able to curate and edit a photo on your phone then send it to print so you know exactly what to expect before committing to using that film. It is super cute and portable, set up and use are easy and the film is pretty much available everywhere for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It’s pretty easy to use, I’m a big fan and with the app I can print whatever and I love it so much. So far, I’ve printed 25 photos and I have nothing bad to say. Photos come out looking just like they would with the actual camera
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to the instax camera
customer_reviews.text: Good alternative to the instax camera. You can choose a "good" picture before printing. The one thing I'd say is that the pictures print a bit dark in comparison to what is seen the phone/device screen. This can be avoided with a bit of editing. One other con for me is that your phone/device's location has to be on for the app to connect to the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: The peinter was delivered with fully blank lithium battery. Usually the electric device has approx. 30 to 60pct from full. It prints well as described. Much better quality than instax camera's photo. The printing speed is very fast. The app is mandatory to print anything via this printer. In fact the app is suck and feel super antient atmosphere with it. However it works well but do not expect fancy functions with it. Overall this printer is good only in case of you purchase under usd 70. Otherwise (in my persinal opinion) the listing is too much overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: SC Gab. Yun

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Purchased and put in a new pack, following the directions and while the first photo was able to print successfully, it will not print another. I have wasted film and the printer indicates that there is 0 error but will not print.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I used to have an Instax camera and probably took over 500 prints. After trial and error and a lot of mistakes, I definitely wasted a ton. This printer totally takes out the error you get with taking the photos and instantly printing. I'm really happy with this and the print quality is pretty good. I've printed about 20 photos and the battery is still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Ann

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t charge, let alone print
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this for my graduation party for everyone to print their favorite photos. Couldn’t even get the thing to charge. Verified the chord was plugged in, checked the battery, and everything. Website advises a total charge takes 120 min. I charged it for over 5 hrs and it still wouldn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer. I originally wanted a camera but I didn't like that I couldn't save the pictures on my phone. There are some hybrid cameras that do both but I chose this printer because, ultimately, I spent thousands of dollars on my cell phone to have a nice camera. This gives you the ability to take amazing pictures on your phone - without carrying anything additional around - and printing out the ones you want later. Excellent product. Easy to use. Works well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah S

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my aunt after she saw me using the SP3. This size lines up a little better with cellphone pics than the square does. Being a designer, she spent a while geeking out on figuring out the colors and printing. Fortunately, we also got her four packs of film! She's really enjoyed it. These things are great. I will reiterate for Fuji if they're reading, please make an Instax wide printer please.
customer_reviews.author: James Symmonds

customer_reviews.title: Battery missing, high hopes and product beautiful but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months in advance to gift to a friend, and was embarrassed, because apparently it did NOT come with a battery. I was very excited to hear her reaction because I had done extensive research to determine which printer would be best and had high hopes about this one. This is very upsetting and would like to request for a battery to be shipped so she can actually use the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Lee

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: i love this printer so much. everywhere i go i’ve been asked where they can buy this printer, and other times the people who own the instax camera tell me they wish they would of known about the printer before they bought the camera. i love the printer because you can pick and take as many photos til you decide on the right one to print. my one dislike is just having to connect to the instaxs wifi every time i wanna print. i wish it was blue tooth :(
customer_reviews.author: Lesley R

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to camera
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our vacation and I’m extremely happy with the purchase. I’ve heard so many complaints about the actual cameras and how the quality isn’t the greatest and it can be difficult to align anything to be centered. The film isn’t the cheapest thing out there so I didn’t want to risk throwing away print after print. This solves the issue and it’s very easy to connect your phone through the app and print pictures directly off your phone! It operates very quietly and provides a great picture quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Way better than using an actual Fuji instax CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This printer has made my world so much better! I am a long time user of fuji instax, but you never know how they are going to turn out... I get it, that is half the excitement, but at the same time, how much film has turned out totally blown out or way too dark? THIS PRINTER SOLVES ALL OF THAT! Take the perfect photo with your phone and print it out. It is amazing. I cannot say enough about this. The app that you need to download is really easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product at a terrific discount!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can print images from my Droid directly on to INSTAX instant film. The printer expels the film quickly. This item was on my wish list for quite a while, and when I noticed another price drop I jumped on it. Item arrived promptly and we'll packed. The family is going to have a blast with this item! I'm certainly glad I stocked up on film before the holidays. Incidentally, please note, colors may print somewhat warmer than original. I noticed this specifically from images created on Apple products. Moto Droid images, however appear to be true to the original.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M Barkovich

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Works with regular fujifilm instax polaroids. 100% worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I love polaroids but sometimes get annoyed with the settings being off. So I bought this and it’s a life saver. You just download their app and there you have an option of 3 filters, zoom and rotation of your photo. Super easy to use. No replace batteries— charging cable included. DOES NOT COME WITH CASE OR FILM.
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This printer and the instax share app do not work with Apple's latest IOS update 13.1.2.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Handy, Portable Printer
customer_reviews.text: Just received this recently. I was able to easily download the smartphone app and with a small effort, connect to the device. Once connected, the process was simple to print. I wish the app had better photo editing capabilities other than rotate and crop. The color filters are okay but not really my thing. I'd rather more actual editing capability than simple filters. I also bought a simple hard case for the printer and cord which I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: D. Damico

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love instant pics.. but hate the poor pic quality.. it's always a gamble on whether the picture will be too dark or too light but you have to waste a picture print to find out. With this printer.. you get to see the picture quality on your phone before you print it, so no more wasted prints! The only thing that is annoying is that you have to connect to it with your phone through your wi-fi. If it were bluetooth it would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Young

customer_reviews.title: liars
customer_reviews.text: when I received mine, it had the instructions and the camera that's it. and when I tried to use it, I noticed there was an empty place where the battery should be! it was supposedly, included, but no. and neither was the charger cord either. this was a gift and it turned out to not work out whatsoever. DONT BUY FROM THIS SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: Christine craig

customer_reviews.title: Printing better than the Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little printer. I have an Instax camera which we have fun with, but the shots are hit-or-miss depending on distance and lighting. With the printer, I can use my phone's camera to make sure the composition and lighting are what I expect before printing. It definitely helps print better photos! Lots of fun to share with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE MADE EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT IS SO WORTH IT! i used to have the regular polaroid camera and i would waste so much film trying to get just one decent picture!! This way you can take as many photos on your phone and not waste film and pic the perfect one on your phone and print it. i also find pictures on pinterest or instagram or photos of celebrities and print those out for room decor. SO WORTH IT AND IM SO HAPPY I FINALLY GOT THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This printer is the best! Upon opening it
customer_reviews.text: This printer is the best! Upon opening it, it only took about an hour and a half for it to charge to full capacity. It's been so fun bringing this lightweight printer around to print polaroids instead of my polaroid camera. It's difficult to take selfies with those, and even harder to lug it around when traveling. With this printer, I can charge it with any usb adapter, and within seconds I can have my photo printed. I suggest using the app to also edit photos so colors can pop more, and you can adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: lbeanburrito

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Like -compact enough to carry for traveling -it uses same film as instax mini camera👍🏻 -prints fast -you can choose and edit photos before printing out Dislike -reprint button is in the middle and I am afriad I will press on it when grabbing the printer -plastic of battery inserting area and film inserting area feels very thin and it looks like it will be very easy to break if not careful -connecting wifi to print is a bit of hassle But overall I like it! It will be a fun little printer for journaling
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on modern Android
customer_reviews.text: The Android app required for printing does not work on my Pixel 2 and there are copious voices on the app store confirming the problem. I managed to make printing work on an iPhone. You should moderate to your expectations wrt print size and image quality. The photographic paper itself looks a lot like a classic polaroid but they are substantially smaller and don't have a smooth back.
customer_reviews.author: Hein

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted a printer because tbh Polaroid cameras suck! You don’t get the right angles and sometimes the lighting isn’t right. You just end up wasting film. I’ve been waiting for the day that I could afford a printer and I finally bought one. I had a lot of extra film I’ve been saving throughout the years, so once I received it, I printed about 40 pictures. The printer charges fast, the colors are vibrant, using the app to edit and pick photos are easy. Not sure about the quality. In my opinion it’s great. Better than the camera 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysShoppingonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging after a while out of nowhere it just stopped charging it’s completely useless and the seller won’t give me my refund customer service is horrible and the product is also horrible
customer_reviews.author: Jizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great little photo printer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up. Purchased the camera for my wife some time ago. It's when we are and about but we did end up printing more "just okay" pictures and had to take pictures on the camera. With this portable printer we can print just the pictures we want after we have had a chance to preview them. No more photos with closed eyes or people looking the wrong way. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R1ceBurner

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and almost TOO fun. I'm going to go through film like crazy, because I want to print all the photos. I was going to invest in another camera but I'm glad i went with the printer instead, it's easier to get the right exposure and not waste film because you can edit the photos before printing.
customer_reviews.author: Laur Duh

customer_reviews.title: Printer won't print photos and just keeps blinking
customer_reviews.text: Printer is blinking. Filled with a new pack twice and the app says that it has no film and won't print any pictures at all. Bought it for an event this weekend and now I'm really let down.
customer_reviews.author: Erzsebet B.

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not hold charge
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately it's overall very nice but the battery won't hold a charge. also I had to keep reconnecting using the app (it's kind of like having to reconnect to bluetooth after every song except for this it's after every picture) but that's the apps fault I'm guessing
customer_reviews.author: TheHub

customer_reviews.title: I don't know why everyone doesnt have one of these
customer_reviews.text: Pictures with your friends? family? pets? all now can be printed on mini old fashion looking polaroids, (i know theyre not polaroids, but come one, theyre similar) i have a string that i use wood clothespins to pin up pictures of memories i want to keep. it's as easy as that to make a diy picture frame for all of these pictures youre going to print out. definitely get the value pack of film, you'll need it.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it would be fun at a party for people to print their photos of the party in a scrapbook. This was impossible for 1 person to use let alone a group. You have to go through hoops to get it to print and even then it only worked maybe 20% of the time. Decided it would be more frustrating then anything so I returned the item but it took UPS 5 days and they did not print a label. I wish Amazon would have let me print the label! Very difficult return and I have not recorded that it was taken.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A year later, still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this printer all the time. We gave it to her as a Christmas gift last year. It's been a great purchase. The pictures aren't large but they're still really neat. We especially love that she doesn't have to worry with bad shots as she would if we had gone with an instant camera. She picks what photos she wants to print. The fact that they look like miniature polaroids just adds to the charm.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: This printer has worked great! It came with a charger and easy instructions
customer_reviews.text: This printer has worked great! It came with a charger and easy instructions. You do have to install the instax app and can print directly from your phone to the camera via connection from bluetooth! You can even edit the pictures on the app or print as is. Definitely worth it and saves you from buying an instax camera! With this printer there is no need, you can just print your images from your own phone or iPad!
customer_reviews.author: Syane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This works great with both my iPhone and my daughters. Pictures came out clear. Easy set up. Make sure when you place the battery in you here the click! I thought it was broken but tried again and that made the difference!!! My daughter is 10 and is super excited to print pics of her and her friends!
customer_reviews.author: Darcib

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect.
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated! I got one picture printed (after a half hour messing around with settings) and can't get another one printed. What is the point of this if I can't use it??
customer_reviews.author: Mr&Mrs

customer_reviews.title: It's pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My friend bought me a photo album where you take one polaroid a day. Sometimes I forget or I'm just too lazy to take one that day. I like that I can just take a picture on my phone and print it that way. It's also nice if you travel a lot because then you don't need to take your polaroid camera with you! All you have to do is take pictures on your phone that you want to print later. This was honestly one of the best purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: TaraSoledad Conty

customer_reviews.title: Fun to print out multiple copies of memories shared with ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun to print out multiple copies of memories shared with friends. Easy to use, once I figured out to turn on GPS (for android devices). Nice size to carry around, not heavy or bulky. However, it's a little difficult to tell how bright the image will turn out. The automatic adjuster doesn't always extract the best prints. I found that once I got the hang of it, going and making minor adjustments yourself can produce prints closer to that on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: This is a brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer! My friends all want one or have purchased one for themselves! I use it at weddings to give the bride and groom their first official wedding picture- I leave it on their table or place it in the gift area! This is getting much use and is worth the price for the joy it brings and for how much it enhances my scrap-booking. Easy to charge, easy to load, easy to use- the app works great on my smartphone and ipad.
customer_reviews.author: B4Me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Polaroid printer
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic printer! We have a Polaroid camera but have had major issues getting stuff in focus. A lot of times the pictures will come out blurry or the colors aren’t great. The image quality is great! Can’t be more happy about how well the pictures come out. Get that old timey look without sacrificing convenience!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: After initially receiving a defective printer, Amazon was kind enough to work with me to replace the printer and it is printing out as it should. I was able to download the app and connect to the wifi no problem. Pictures turn out great! I am very happy with this product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect your printed photos to look like photo shot with polaroid camera.
customer_reviews.text: Your pictures printed with this won't look exactly like ones shot with an actual polaroid camera unless you use pictures that already have flash. There is also an issue where if the photo is too dark, the dark regions may come out just looking like a big black blob. If you want to make it more like actual polaroid photos, you need to adjust the color balance in the app before you actually print it.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a super-fun gift. It has all of the fun of the instax cameras but you're guaranteed to get high quality prints. We used to use the instax camera but the prints were really hit or miss. With this app+printer you get great results every time. The software/app is a bit clunky but the results work like magic!
customer_reviews.author: Niko B.

customer_reviews.title: I Love this little printer.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and set up. I'm happy with it! Just remember to use the intelligence Filter, and over saturate your images before printing them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.D

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: It worked. If you want to print Polaroid like pictures from your phone, this is perfect for it! I tried another brand prior but it wasn't compatible with my phone. I initially had difficulty connecting with this 1 as well, but it was just a location permission issue. Since then I've had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can choose whatever image I want to print and its amazing for occasions where multiple people want the same image. Its a great idea!! Easy to use. I like the concept of it. Lets me print out the pictures that I know I came out cute in contrast to simply accepting how I came out the the fujifilm camera. I also love how you can take it everywhere just like the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dp1299

customer_reviews.title: JUST buy it. You'll love it
customer_reviews.text: this was the best thing ever to have if you love these type of pictures. the photo inserts are not cheap, but its worth it when you print them out. It's a lot better then having an instant-camera. This printer you know what your going to print and you can adjust some settings and improve the image quality. MUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Father of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is so awesome overall! I love not having to worry about carrying my polaroid cameras around anymore - I ended up breaking the only two I ever had after some time of having them due to a drop to the ground and so on. This is a perfect gift or personal purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: TG AGAPE

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to print the pictures because now I don't have to worry about lugging my polaroid camera around. It's really easy to set up; I watched a video on how the printer would work prior to ordering it and I think that helped a lot with my set up process. The prints don't come out exactly how your pictures may look on the app, they tend to be a little more exposed when actually printed but other than that I definitely recommend this for someone who likes holding onto polaroid prints without having to worry about dragging your actual polaroid camera around.
customer_reviews.author: Maramae Canubas

customer_reviews.title: Great printer, Issues with new iPhone OS 13
customer_reviews.text: We love the quality of prints we get from thus printer and use them to decorate our little boy’s room. The printer has trouble connecting to new iPhones running OS 13 and will give you several frustrating error messages but I imagine the glitches be resolved with future updates.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: good quality prints
customer_reviews.text: I've had an instax camera for quite a while but didn't really use it because it's kinda hard to get the perfect setting and I didn't want to waste films. this printer helped me solve that problem, now I can print as many photos I want without worrying about the outcome. definitely recommend buying this printer if yu don't want to carry around the instax camera, I also like that you can create collages and print them as well
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Decent upgrade, but not a WOW factor
customer_reviews.text: Compare to SP-1, the spec has higher resolution but you can hardly tell. The result of photos are still fairly blurry at best. It increased a little more dynamic range, but the result would end up to be less saturated like SP-1. It gives a better skin tone, but lacks of punches for landscape. It's good addition for usb charging and rechargeable batteries. The building quality went down from SP-1 as well. It's taller, and narrower, also lighter, but it's built from even more plastic.
customer_reviews.author: C. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have never made a better purchase! I have 2 instax mini cameras but it seems like I could just never get it out in time at the right time. Plus I had so many memories from before I got the camera that I wanted to capture. This printer and app are SO easy. It charges quickly. It uses the same film as my camera. I seriously can’t get over how well it works! I have printed out like 30 photos since just receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: If it ever breaks, I would buy another.
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is my obsession!!!! I use it all the time. I love when I have parties for my kids and take hundreds of pics I can instantly print them and pass them out at the end with a thanks for coming and goodie bags. I love how every picture printed will be perfect unlike the actual camera you only get one chance for the perfect picture.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: WAY BETTER THAN INSTAX CAM ITSELF
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I took so long to purchase this! But so glad I got it. The photos on an Instax Cam are usually bad. But having this little nifty printer helps me print my high quality photos with very rich colors. It was weird to set it up at first, but once you do it once, it's extremely easy. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BMT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on-the-go type of people
customer_reviews.text: It’s the bestest thing ever!!! I really love pictures, and I really wanted to print my photos. However, it’s not easy to find a photo printer that is really easy to use and very handy. Then, I saw this in amazon and the fact that it’s very on-the-go made me buy it! I didn’t hesitate at all! I did read some negative comments about this product, but I just followed the instructions, and everything went well! The pictures came out perfectly just like I want it to be!! Now I bought more instax films and more photo albums so I can enjoy printing my favorite and memorable photos during this time 💕 stay safe everybody!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Bagarino

customer_reviews.title: I love how convenient these are
customer_reviews.text: I love how convenient these are. Instant pictures with great quality, and my friend took it everywhere with her while we traveled about in San Francisco. It fit well in her purse, and printed quickly. They are small sized polaroids (which we were aware of) so if you're looking for normal sized ones, this isn't the printer for you. Otherwise, it's perfect for a gift or for personal use!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good option if you like Instax cameras
customer_reviews.text: Great option if you’re into the Instax cameras. It’s hard to always get a good photo with instants, with the printer you get to choose your photos. On the other hand if you’re more selective you probably end up printing less. I brought this on vacation and we didn’t end up printing any photos 😅 The Instax film gives more of a vintage feel. I originally purchased the HP Sprocket but the photos were grainy and the color was off
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this printer I was debating if I should get this or the newer version since some reviews had said it can be difficult to use because of the WiFi feature but this one works just fine! First you connect your phone to the printers wifi and then you can print through the app. Easy steps and the quality is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the bee’s knees. I take a LOT of pictures, and since they usually just end up sitting on my camera roll, this is a fun way to display them. The setup was super easy, the pictures are wonderful quality, and the printing is super fast. I’m not sure on battery life, as I have just left it plugged in, but I definitely recommend this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: low quality prints
customer_reviews.text: for people that need a physical print immediately this camera and film combo will work. the print quality is low which is expected for a quick developing process. cellphone pictures are a much better option unless a print is required immediately
customer_reviews.author: Kerry K

customer_reviews.title: Great for memories
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer! I have a polaroid camera, which I got before this printer, and I love it. However, when I'm trying to do group pictures, someone always blinks, moves, or makes a weird face. Its too much money to keep taking new pictures. But this printer is great for that. You can edit the pictures off your phone, create collages and add text to it before printing. Overall it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina J.

customer_reviews.title: Not working device
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I spoke with Amazon, tried to call the seller, lost a lot of time! I want this resolved! My printer has troubleshooting. Pics come very pale out of the machine. The app does what it wants and prints doubles and turns off. I want to return this product!
customer_reviews.author: Denise V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for including in cards, updating photos at your desk
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for my birthday and I love it. We just had a baby and I use this to print out new pictures occasionally for my desk and to include in thank you cards for people who got us baby gifts. We even printed out a few for a grandma before visiting and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Prints awesome pictures. I have the Polaroid camera and the picture quality isn't super great. This printer is used with an app on your phone using the same Polaroid film but the quality is so much better. The app is super easy to use. You can print any picture in your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Graves

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact it prints from your phone but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it prints from your phone but the colors are too light, even if I put the pictures darker the photo comes out light and sometimes almost impossible to appreciate but otherwise love the fast connection to the phone!
customer_reviews.author: sinayel💃

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy setup! I printed out pics from my cell phone and am in love with this thing! Make sure you buy lots of film bc it is addicting! I have a Instax Mini camera but love that you can print pics from your phone and give as gifts. No more wasted film which isn’t cheap. Now I’m contemplating the latest version for the square film.
customer_reviews.author: Purpledublin

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Got this for programs and photo printing. It's much more practical than a Polaroid camera, or the like, but I find the required app a little cumbersome, even if it's necessary. Everything else was intuitive, though, and easy to use. Don't print out too many wildly colored pictures, though--I tried printing a picture with neon lighting, and the faces looked splotched and gross. Otherwise, it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Big Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: This Instax is easy to use and charges quickly. I like this idea of printing straight from my iPhone because I can play around with how I want my picture to turn out. Compared to the Instax Mini cameras, I don't have to take much chances with playing with the lighting and such. When I first got it, it was bulkier/bigger than I expected. You should get the Khanka hard case to go with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have saved my money!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift I bought for my daughter. For irrelevant reasons it took me a while to contact Fujifilm regarding the error— Indicator kept saying there is no film pack. I’m actually a Fujifilm consumer, but after this—I may consider Polaroid. Called and I have to pay to get a replacement—what?! Trash! I wish I would have seen the reddit comments sooner.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great. I have the Instax camera however your photos are hit & miss. With this printer you know what your picture will be and can adjust the lighting, crop or do whatever to it before printing. The only thing is you do have to change your Wi-Fi settings to the printer before printing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Lover

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I love my printer!! Ever since I’ve gotten it haven’t touched my Polaroid camera at all. This printer is really convenient since since I no longer have to carry around the heavy Polaroid camera. The quality of the photos are really clear but still have the effect of the “film” look.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and portable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fourteen-year-old and she absolutely loves it. Super easy to go through the app and edit and crop photos. She prints for all kinds of projects she likes to look at. Very easy to use and the battery last quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Butterzbean

customer_reviews.title: Charges quickly and i printed 30 photos right off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Charges quickly and i printed 30 photos right off the bat, back to back with no issues, the app installed with no issues however certain photos on my phone werent eligible to be printed (perhaps because of their dimentions) but i'm sure you could troubleshoot that if you tweak the settings or something
customer_reviews.author: Vita

customer_reviews.title: awesome alternative to a old fashioned polaroid camera!
customer_reviews.text: worth the investment! its much easier to print out the pictures from your phone than trying to get the perfect frame on a polaroid camera. this little printer is small, very cute and the pictures print out pretty fast. the only problem would be the application on the phone sometimes does not want to connect, but after a try or two it connects and you are able to print what you need.
customer_reviews.author: nathaly

product_meta.title: Fujifilm INSTAX Share SP-2 Mobile Printer (Silver)
product_meta.description: Color:Silver| Style:BaseInstax Share SP-2 lets you print out your best smartphone pictures faster than ever in high quality credit-card sized prints. This next generation Instax Share SP-2 features a sleek body, gorgeous image quality, improved Wi-Fi connectivity and a refined operation, all in two new gorgeous colors - Silver and Gold - with added texture for classic good looks. The new Share SP-2 improves its speed over the original Share SP-1 by printing smoothly and quietly in just 10 seconds compared to 16 seconds in the previous model.
feature_bullets: Create instax photos by sending images from smartphones and tablets using the free share app

High resolution images with print pixels of 800x600 dots and print resolution of 320 dpi to show detailed gradations, facial expressions, characters or objects clearly; Uses 256 levels per color (RGB)
A new laser exposure system achieves a faster printing time of 10 seconds from print data transfer to print output
Equipped with a rechargeable battery that charges via micro USB port; Available in silver and gold

Operating temperature: +5° Celsius to + 40° Celsius / +41° Fahrenheit to + 104° Fahrenheit (no condensation); There is a manual adjustment on the share printer app that allows you to make image darker or lighter as you see fit
Please note: Kindly refer the user manual especially please refer pages 31 and 32 for better use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,354 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
